dialog.title: Fortune Cookies!
dialog.footer:
Many more Fortune Cookies left.
Share with friends?

gifted.header:
You received yummy Fortune Cookie!
Open for a special surprise!

nongifted.header:
I bake you Fortune Cookie...
Open for a special surprise!

new_user.header:
Welcome! Me Dr. Mojo.
[NAME] send you yummy Fortune Cookie.

wordbubble.gift_received:
You received Fortune Cookie from friend!
Click it to open!
wordbubble.cookie_received:
You received Fortune Cookie!
Click it to open!

category.fortune: Beware of small dogs and big cats.
Never look an elephant in the eye.
If you were thinking about a burrito for lunch, think again.
For one day make yellow your favorite color. Get pumped about it!
Dreams start in your head but end up in your legs.

Try doing something new and exciting.
Not skydiving, though.

Every time you step on a crack,
somebody drops a pancake on the floor.
Today, try the soup instead of the salad. Trust me.
When dining out, always go for the special. Itâ€™s usually good!
